query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST166 (MANDT,CS166_DKD,CS166_GND,CS166_MYM,CS166_GBN,CS166_DAT,CS166_ARA,CS166_MST,CS166_MDT,CS166_MMA,CS166_DDT,CRDAT,CRTIM) SELECT X.MAN, X.DKD, X.GND, X.MYM, X.GBN, X.DAT, X.ARA, X.MST, X.MDT, X.MMA, X.DDT, HEX(CURRENT DATE), -- ETL 식별컬럼 추가. 2021.04.13 Han JH HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- ETL 식별컬럼 추가. 2021.04.13 Han JH FROM ( SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) MAN, '1' DKD, 'A' GND, CAST(#GYM# AS VARCHAR(6)) MYM, '3' GBN, CAST(#BSU# AS VARCHAR(4)) DAT, CAST(#ARA# AS VARCHAR(2)) ARA, 'Y' MST, HEX(CURRENT DATE) MDT, CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(8)) MMA, '' DDT FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) MAN, '1' DKD, 'B' GND, CAST(#GYM# AS VARCHAR(6)) MYM, '3' GBN, CAST(#BSU# AS VARCHAR(4)) DAT, CAST(#ARA# AS VARCHAR(2)) ARA, 'Y' MST, HEX(CURRENT DATE) MDT, CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(8)) MMA, '' DDT FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) MAN, '1' DKD, 'C' GND, CAST(#GYM# AS VARCHAR(6)) MYM, '3' GBN, CAST(#BSU# AS VARCHAR(4)) DAT, CAST(#ARA# AS VARCHAR(2)) ARA, 'Y' MST, HEX(CURRENT DATE) MDT, CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(8)) MMA, '' DDT FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) MAN, '1' DKD, 'D' GND, CAST(#GYM# AS VARCHAR(6)) MYM, '3' GBN, CAST(#BSU# AS VARCHAR(4)) DAT, CAST(#ARA# AS VARCHAR(2)) ARA, 'Y' MST, HEX(CURRENT DATE) MDT, CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(8)) MMA, '' DDT FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) X
